How long shall we Mourn in the dark The bliss and the beauty Will not return Say farewell to sadness and grief Though long and hard the road may be Even in silence I hear the words An oath we shall swear 'In the name of the one' Until the world's end It can't be broken

UnitType.Description: Pioneers are equipped with the necessary supplies to start new settlements and create outposts.
UnitType.Backstory: A human once asked what made our cause just. Vengeance for our sunken Land, to us, is the most noble of intentions. The fundamental dynamics of the universe are with us to cover all the world in eternal frost where none but we live. 'What about humanity? A hundred thousand people who are not yet ready to die!' said the human. They damn well better be.

UnitType.Description: Use scouts to explore the world.

UnitType.Description: Pioneers are equipped with the necessary supplies to start new settlements and create outposts.
UnitType.Backstory: I don't care about your plans and schemes Don't give a damn 'bout your righteous dreams All that I do, I do for myself I never cared for anyone else

UnitType.Description: Pioneers are equipped with the necessary supplies to start new settlements and create outposts.
Use scouts to explore the world.
Pioneers are equipped with the necessary supplies to start new settlements and create outposts.
UnitType.Backstory: When their bones are picked clean and the clean bones gone, They shall have stars at elbow and foot; Though they go mad they shall be sane, Though they sink through the sea they shall rise again; Though lovers be lost love shall not; And death shall have no dominion.

UnitType.Description: Use scouts to explore the world.
